title.bibl: Saloniki-Greek Press, May 21, 1921. New Immigration Laws of United States

div.bibl: Saloniki, May 21, 1921. NEW IMMIGRATION LAWS OF UNITED STATES

body.p: A few days ago a law was passed in the United States Senate limiting the entrance of immigrants to three per cent of the present number of each nationality. In 1910 the number of Greeks in the United States was 175,000.
Approximately the same number of Greeks will be allowed to enter between July, 1921 and July, 1922 as came in 1825.
